function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High level of entrepreneurship pre-crisis","Impact":"Regions with high entrepreneurship may be more resilient to exogenous shocks, reducing the impact of crises like COVID-19.","Mitigation":"Encourage and support entrepreneurship in regions to build resilience and adaptation to crises.","Technologies":"Entrepreneurial development programs, access to funding, and mentorship programs.","People":"Entrepreneurs, business owners, policymakers","Owner":"Government, local business organizations, entrepreneurial support organizations."},{"Description":"Post-disaster entrepreneurs contributing to recovery","Impact":"Entrepreneurs contribute to recovery by supplying necessary resources to disaster victims and leveraging social capital.","Mitigation":"Develop programs and incentives to support and empower post-disaster entrepreneurs.","Technologies":"Social networking platforms, disaster relief technology, and entrepreneurial training programs.","People":"Post-disaster entrepreneurs, disaster victims, community members","Owner":"Government, NGOs, community organizations."},{"Description":"Relying solely on entrepreneurial initiative to fix economic damage triggered by lockdown measures","Impact":"Relying solely on entrepreneurship may not be sufficient to address the economic damage caused by lockdown measures, leading to continued economic strain.","Mitigation":"Provide sufficient resources and support to innovative startups, without solely relying on entrepreneurial initiative.","Technologies":"Financial assistance programs, access to capital, business development resources.","People":"Innovative startups, policymakers, business support organizations","Owner":"Government, economic development agencies, financial institutions."}]}
